blogs.title: Mrs.Queen
blogs.body: A modern chef suddenly becomes trapped inside the body of a queen from the Joseon era, which causes chaos for everyone involved.
blogs.author: Yoon Sung-sik

blogs.title: moon embracing the sun
blogs.body: Set against the backdrop of a Korean traditional palace, this fantasy drama tells the poignant love story between a king and a female shaman.
blogs.author: Jin Soo-wan

blogs.title: Moon Lovers
blogs.body: Ha-jin travels 1000 years back in time and lands in the era of Goryeo Dynasty as a young girl named Hae-soo. Ha-jin, now trapped in another person's body, becomes involved in a power struggle against various vicious contenders to the throne.
blogs.author: Bu Bu Jing Xin
